text:
When we had this happening, it was a matter of users not logging off and
ignoring the patching reboot prompts for eternity. Our desktop support people
changed the relevant GPOs to enforce the reboot.

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement]
metadata.email_text_original:
When we had this happening, it was a matter of users not logging off and
ignoring the patching reboot prompts for eternity. Our desktop support people
changed the relevant GPOs to enforce the reboot. 
On Mon, Nov 27, 2023 at 5:42 PM 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement
<patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/CAEuHzzm5TVQEtzu%3DiXhZF84xnnV3f9yyEQA1ujCysw%3DtFmunqA%40mail.gmail.com
